content: Freegans embrace community, generosity, social concern, freedom, cooperation, and sharing in opposition to a society based on materialism, moral apathy, competition, conformity, and greed.
translations: ita:I freegani abbracciano la comunità, la generosità, il problema sociale, la libertà, la cooperazione, e la condivisione r
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by shekitten (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
